Entities.Name: Problem
Entities.Definition: Clinical conditions or diagnoses that a patient may have or be screened for.

Entities.Name: Medication
Entities.Definition: Any drug or therapeutic treatment prescribed or used by the patient.

Entities.Name: Lab
Entities.Definition: Laboratory test names or lab-related measurements.

Entities.Name: Rating Criteria
Entities.Definition: Clinical rating scores used for cognitive or physical assessment.

Entities.Name: Social Determinant Health
Entities.Definition: Social or behavioral context influencing patient eligibility.

Entities.Name: Procedure
Entities.Definition: Medical or surgical interventions or tests performed on a patient.

Entities.Name: Fertilize
Entities.Definition: Mentions related to fertility, reproduction, or contraception status.

Dataset.Name: AD Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria (ClinicalTrials.gov)
Dataset.Description: A manually annotated dataset of eligibility criteria text from 300 Alzheimer’s disease clinical trials, used for developing and evaluating a pipeline for NER and NEN.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Entities were annotated using the CLAMP toolkit and a CRF-based model trained on preprocessed eligibility criteria. Entity normalization used SapBERT embeddings with custom exact and partial match rules, and a specialized negation-prefix detection system.
